title: 148862335.dont Do Business Backwards
excerpt: It’s easy to get hung up on the details, to stress over the minutia of starting a business or a project.

children.text: It’s easy to get hung up on the details, to stress over the minutia of starting a business or a project.
To worry about word choice or the logo or the lighting or the website or the color of the walls.
You want your customers to appreciate and expect conscious design. They want a clean, streamlined UX, they want a consistent brand experience, they need to feel something in the
But worrying about the little things before you’ve actually made something worth selling, presenting, marketing or talking about, that’s completely missing the point.
Make it useful before you make it flashy.
